title: Add fetchAndUpdateParticipantProfile method to MessageWebhookHandler
description: Add private async method fetchAndUpdateParticipantProfile(conversation, senderId, pageId) to fetch participant profile from Instagram API and update conversation entity
dod: Private method fetchAndUpdateParticipantProfile added to handler
Method calls conversation.updateParticipantProfile with fetched data
Method persists updated conversation via repository.update
Method is non-blocking: wrapped in try-catch, logs errors but doesn't throw
Method handles API failures gracefully (conversation created without profile)
